Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;iodine^reset; to ^green;Bella^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 做得好！有几种基本成分是你研究中不可或缺的，而碘就是其中之一，所以你最好储存一些！因为制作石墨烯或者高品质的肥料都将需要到它！
Texts.Eng: Good work! Several basic ingredients such as iodine are essential. So stay stocked! You'll need iodine specifically to make graphene and high quality fertilizers!

Texts.Chs: 如果你想获得^orange;碘^reset;，那么首先你得找到^green;生硝石^reset;，你可以在沙漠特征的星球上找到它。接着把^orange;生硝石^reset;丢进你的^green;物质萃取设备^reset;，然后再把碘给我。
Texts.Eng: You'll need to find some ^green;caliche stone^reset; if you want to get ^orange;iodine^reset;. Throw ^orange;batches of caliche stone^reset; into your ^green;extraction lab^reset; and bring me some! You'll find them on ^orange;desert biomes^reset;.
